text: Pavel Semenovich Morozenko (; ; July 5, 1939 â€“ July 14, 1991) was a Soviet movie and theatre actor. In 1960, Morozenko graduated from the National University of theatre, cinema and television of Karpenko-Kary, and in the same year, he made his movie debut in Roman and Francesca, a movie directed by Vladimir Denisenko. In 1973, he was awarded the title of Honored artist of the Ukrainian SSR. Morozenko died on July 14, 1991. He was aged 52. == Other websites == * Category:1939 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Russian actors Category:Soviet actors Category:Ukrainian actors
title: Pavel Morozenko
